data.message:
~
~Every Page~
If I go back to the start
And it tears me apart
Would you help me to see
Who it is I could be
Or would you turn your back
As my mind starts to crack
As I’m left all alone
On a transparent throne
With no future or past
Or a shadow to cast
I don't know how I feel
Or realize what is real
So I'm left standing here
But can not shed a tear
Over who I have been
In a river of sin
Because I am who I am
No one else gives a damn
But inside of my mind
All the pages unwind
So I'll do what I can
But I'm only a man
Who has made his mistakes
For not hitting the brakes
Now I can't change a thing
Take the pain from the sting
Of who it is I've become
Or where it is I am from
I've been burned like an ash
That's been placed in the trash
Guess I’ll never be free
Of these feelings in me
So now I'm here to tell
That I've traveled through hell
And the things I explain
Are my feelings of pain
For this life can be hard
On the stage where you've stared
But it's the script that I wrote
Every page, every note
~Peace~
